metaDescription: Just enter how many kWh you need and find the best charging price on every stations.
title: Chargeprice – Alle tarieven op alle laadpalen in een app
manageMyTariffsDescription: Selecteer alle tarieven bij die je geregistreerd bent
totalPriceInfo:
€ = Total price excl. monthly fees
* Calculated values incl. 10% charging drain. Actual values depend on vehicle, charging station, weather etc.
** Depending on tariff: Base fee, service fee, membership fee
showExclusiveProviderCustomerTariffsDeta: Sommige providers bieden gunstigere tarieven aan
onlyShowMyTariffsDetail: Alleen laadpalen waar mijn tarieven of geen registratie voor nodig is worden getoond
feedbackContent: Mis je een feature, een laadpas of klopt er iets niet? Schrijf ons een email via contact@chargeprice.net
dataSourceContentPlugsurfing: Charging prices PlugSurfing: PlugSurfing API
dataSourceContentNewMotion: Charging prices New Motion: New Motion API
plugcheckerToChargepriceContent: Nieuwe naam, zelfde voordelen! Vanaf nu is chargeprice.app ons officiele webadres
stationsWithAtLeast2ChargePoints: Alleen laadpalen met minstens twee laadpunten
startTimeSelectionHeader: When do you want to charge?
popupWelcomeText1:
Electric Vehicles are cool and charging is too!
We guide you through the different charging cards and apps and tell you which one works best for you!
popupWelcomeText2:
No need to think of kWh, minute and session based prices or how long the charge would take. 
We do the math and show you the estimated costs of your charging session.
popupSocialMediaText1: On our Social Media Channels we always keep you up to date about the newest trends in charging your EV!
popupInstallText: Did you know that you can use Chargeprice just like a normal app, outside the browser?
popupDonateHeader: Together we our on a mission to transparent charging!
popupDonateText:
Chargeprice is and should stay free for all EV driver! However the servers it runs on are not.
Help us to operating, maintaining and especially improving Chargeprice in the future! Thank you!
